ingredients: 1 pound / 500 grams chicken breast or thigh fillets, cut into 1-inch / 2 1/2 centimeter pieces
3 tablespoons Chinese rice wine (shaoxing wine) or dry sherry
1/2 onion (yellow, brown or white), chopped into 1 centimeter / 1/3-inch pieces
1 small green bell pepper, chopped into 1 centimeter / 1/3-inch pieces
